headline: Equifax and Mastercard Join Forces to Combat Payment Fraud in Latin America
summary: Equifax® (NYSE: EFX) and Mastercard (NYSE: MA) have joined forces to empower Latin American financial institutions, payment service providers, acquiring banks, and merchants to overcome payment fraud challenges without disruption to the customer experience.

raw.headline: Equifax and Mastercard Join Forces to Combat Payment Fraud in Latin America

headline: Mastercard Stock Up 16.1% in 6 Months: What Should Investors Do Now?
summary: MA benefits from diversified revenue streams and a strong core business. The ongoing secular shift to digital payments should also aid the company's results.
